conclusion: Known data: R₁ = 20 Ω, R₂ = 10 Ω, I₀ = 0.50 A
Calculate supply voltage U = I₀ · R₁ = 10 V
Close the switch, motor branch connected in parallel with R₁
Calculate I_calc for parallel combination: I_calc ≈ 1.5 A
Calculate P_calc for purely resistive case: P_calc ≈ 15 W
Back-emf causes I_real < 1.5 A, thus P_real < 15 W
Actual electric power consumed P < 15 W
